entries.title: Proof-of-personhood System
entries.contribution: Prototyped and implemented a highly robust proof-of-presence group communication and voting app for mobile devices at the Decentralized Distributed Systems Laboratory with 9 other students. Managed the back-end team composed of 3 students during the project.
